content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * bella is an asymmetric lace edged scarf/shawl is knit diagonally using stockinette stitch and a bit of garter stitch on the borders you may increase or decrease repeats of either lace section to accommodate the amount of yarn you have just continue knitting until you reach desired size or run out of yarn you will need a minimum of 400 meters dk weight yarn and 4 00mm needles gold scarf in photo is knit with 400 meters dk yarn and measures 62 x 20 inches for a larger scarf or shawl you will need a minimum of 600 meters of dk yarn blocking required enjoy dieses tuch mit lace-kante wird diagonal mittels rechter und linker maschen gestrickt man benötigt mindestens 400m garn in dk stärke und 4 00mm nadeln man strickt bis zur gewünschten größe oder soweit das garn reicht viel spaß danke tatjana 1 fur deutsch-ubersetzung ce châle à bordure dentellée est tricoté sur la diagonale en point jersey et point mousse vous aurez besoin d un minimum de 400 mètres de laine taille dk et des aiguilles 4 00 mm tricotez jusqu à ce que la longueur vous convienne bon tricot traduit en francais per mariannou 2 questo scialle con finale a pizzo e lavorato diagonalmente usando maglia rasata e legaccio vi servono minimo 400 meri di filato dk e ferri 4 00mm e 3 50mm potete continuare a lavorarlo fino a che non raggiunge la vostra lunghezza preferita buon divertimento traduzione di marina 3 per conto di unfilodi 4 pattern information language s english french german italian number of pages 2 english 2 french 3 german 2 italian instructions written sizes variable photos 2 1 http //www ravelry com/people/janevi 2 http //www ravelry com/people/mariannou 3 http //www ravelry com/people/bricci 4 http //unfilodi com/
